resources.string: Introducing Process Automation Integrating Business Functions
Share your important moments with friends and family.
Follow interesting genres and creators from around the world.

Process Automation Software is typically a suite of integrated applications that a company can use to collect, store, manage and interpret data from many business activities, including: Product planning, cost, manufacturing, service delivery, marketing and sales.
No application is available to view PDF file.
No application is available to view Excel file.
